fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player. This ability is only here in case you are a clone of a role with no ability that can target other players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are a clone of a random player's role, sharing their abilities and attributes, but not their goal or alignment. That person will be your Target.
- You may be a clone of a unique role, but not a Town Power.
- If you copy a role that would normally have access to a faction chat and/or a faction attack, you will have access to neither.
- If you visit your target using any ability, you will be notified, and you will deal them an Unstoppable Attack.
- If your target is killed by someone other than you, you will be given a new role to copy, and you will lose your previously copied abilities and attributes.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill someone who has the role that you are a copy of.
